text: Ara raja balala, ‘tomara i'usuphake amara kache niye asa [1].’ Atahpara yakhana duta tara kache upasthita hala takhana tini balalena, ‘tumi tomara manibera kache phire ya'o ebam take jijnesa kara, ye narira hata kete phelechila tadera abastha ki! Niscaya amara raba tadera chalana samparke samyaka abagata [2].’
